Package io.github.jy95.fds.r5.functions

Class QuantityToStringR5

java.lang.Object
io.github.jy95.fds.r5.functions.QuantityToStringR5
All Implemented Interfaces:
QuantityToString<FDSConfigR5,org.hl7.fhir.r5.model.Quantity>
public class QuantityToStringR5 extends Object implements QuantityToString<FDSConfigR5,org.hl7.fhir.r5.model.Quantity>
R5 class for converting quantity objects to human-readable strings. Implements the Bill Pugh Singleton pattern for thread-safe lazy initialization.
Author:
jy95
